results.title: Tugboats and harbors
results.brief_description: Follows a tugboat skipper, crew and harbor pilot through their daily work of moving ships in and out of harbor. Dramatises the enormous effort needed to get goods from one place to another, and illustrates the need for co-operation among many people to accomplish a large task.

results.title: Tugboats
results.brief_description: The story of a busy tugboat whose job it is to help other tugboats to move ships and liners in a big harbor on the coast of North America. Includes a shot of the ocean passenger liner ‘Queen Elizabeth I’ docking.

results.title: Tugboat Mickey
results.creator_credit: Clyde Geronimi, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Gang’s All Here”
Tugboat Captain Mickey hears what he thinks is a distress signal from a sinking ship and orders his two man crew to the rescue. Their energetic ineptitude leads from one mishap to another.

results.title: Tuffy the turtle
results.brief_description: Shows physical characteristics of turtles: their shell, head, legs, feet, teeth and eyes, and their reactions to stimuli. Tells a story about a turtle who overcomes ridicule from animal friends after a snail makes him realise how useful a hard shell can be. A language arts teaching film integrating science with a story.

results.title: Tuberculosis: its diagnosis, treatment and control
results.brief_description: Shows the nature, means of transmission, the diagnosis, the treatment of pulmonary tuberculosis. Sunlight and fresh, freely circulating air are the enemies of germs; many city dwellers are, therefore, constantly exposed to the danger of infection with tuberculosis. This film tells the story of Mary Smith, and American high school student who with her aunt is treated successfully.

results.title: Tsunami
results.creator_credit: Anna Broinowski, Lisa Duff, Froxoff Films and Latent Image
results.brief_description: A fantastical comedy about the clash of two cultures. Some likely surfing lads on Bondi Beach take offense to the Japanese surfer Jiro (Monchi) on the water and an entourage of Japanese tourists taking photos. Insults and racist slurs ensue until Jiro summons the mythical monster Godzilla to come to his defence. Panic follows as crowds on the beach foreshore run to safety. The film includes appearances by a number of well known Australian actors like Tiriel Mora, Jeremy Sims and Sarah Chadwick.

results.title: Tsiamelo: a place of goodness
results.creator_credit: Betty Wolpert, Blanche Tsimatsima, Ellen Kuzwayo and Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen
results.brief_description: A remarkable and sensitive film dealing with the reality of racial segregation in South Africa by showing us how a single family and their friends have been affected by the 1913 Native Land Act and subsequent laws.

results.title: Tsetse: a secret of life
results.creator_credit: Frank Cadman, Gaumont-British Instructional and J. Arthur Rank
results.brief_description: This film is about the history of the tsetse fly or “nagana” and the resulting battle against the mysterious cattle killer. A young Australian doctor, David Bruce, discovered the secret of how the tsetse caused death in cattle. Notable among the pioneers was Charles Swinerton - the results of his research leading the British Government in 1925 to grant a quarter million pounds to develop a chemical to attack the tsetse. A re-enactment shows the discovery by British scientists of antrycide, an insecticide which has its real value in its ability to protect the cattle from becoming infected. The film shows the insecticide being sprayed from the air in Kenya and emphasises the willing cooperation between the African herdsmen and the British scientists.

results.title: Tschaikovsky: a musical romance
results.creator_credit: James A. FitzPatrick and Fitzpatrick Pictures
results.brief_description: A film of historical interest, it presents a dramatised portrayal of the three romantic episodes in the life of Peter Ilich Tschaikovsky accompanied by selections from his music.
